long_description: Spray your way into summer with the Stream Machine TL-750 water launcher. If you'd rather be on the water instead of getting doused by it, the TL-750 also serves as a fast bilge pump for your boat. 27 in. water launcher sends a stream of water up to 70 ft. so you can soak opponents near and far. In the time it takes ordinary water guns to be refilled once, the TL-750 can be refilled and emptied several times. High-impact polymer offers strength and durability to last all summer long. The Stream Machine TL-750 water launcher doubles as a quick and effective bilge pump for your kayaking or canoeing adventures.
short_description: Spray your way into summer with the Stream Machine TL-750 water launcher. If you'd rather be on the water instead of getting doused by it, the TL-750 also serves as a fast bilge pump for your boat.
